column5: I am looking for a good place to take some kids fishing or a family trip. Does anyone have any suggestions that would be good. Somewhere up by Rainy Lake, LOW or just into Canada?
There's a lot of nice resorts and good fishing around the morson area on lotws

I'm going with my kids to White River. Flyin to Garnham lake. Sure they will love it. Great walleye fishing. Of course my youngest is 44 I think !!!! You will have fun where ever you take them, believe me. Have fun with your kids, I'm going to. !!!!
Birch Dale Lodge www.birchdalelodge.com 807-227-5262 on Eagle Lake in Vermillion Bay Ontario.

Hidden Bay Lodge in Sioux Lookout. www.hiddenbay.com I've been taking the kids there for years and going to Miniss Lake. Great service. we show up and the staff takes care of us. You cant go wrong. Tell them Bert sent ya! Have fun! Bert

Indian Lake Lodge, Vermilion Bay, On. 20 miles west of Dryden, great camp, super clean, great owners, tons of walleyes lots of muskies, smallies,trout, few northerns and GREAT PRICES,my wife and I have stayed there for 15 years and the wife loves the place as much as I do,nuff said!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
